item.title: Leftist Groups Plan Inauguration Day ‘Insurrection’
item.description: Their agenda didn't resonate voters. If this were 2021, they would be telling conservatives to accept the loss, sit down, and be quiet.

item.title: Wisconsin Capital City Under Investigation Over Failure To Count Nearly 200 Ballots
item.description: 'I thought this was so egregious that it was important that we move immediately,' said Ann Jacobs, chairwoman of WI Elections Commission.

item.title: Efforts To Sentence Trump In Sham NY Criminal Case Confirm Democrats’ Crazy Lawfare

item.title: Does Meghan Markle Want Us To Hate Her?
item.description: When Netflix came knocking, what pitches did she turn down when she opted for this Ballerina Farm wannabe vanity project?
